Title: Requires the removal or covering of inapplicable highway work zone traffic control signs
Summary: Requires that signs posted for highway work zone traffic control, including but not limited to highway construction zones, maintenance work areas, or restricted highways, be promptly covered or removed whenever such sign or signs are not applicable.
LawCode: Add ยง1686, amd ยง155, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to requiring the removal or covering of inapplicable highway work zone traffic control signs
